issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I have an ASP.NET website and it is not properly rendered in the WebView Control due to the wrong browser config file. I believe it uses a default config in C:\Windows\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v4.0.30319\Config\Browsers\Default.browser.
I am trying to render it to WebView on IOS simulator. I was expecting that safari browser will work. However, is seems that the name of the WedView browser is Mobile Mozilla Compatible. So, it cannot be mapped correctly.
The website displays correctly on iPAD and iPhone in Safari browser. The only problem is with Titanium WebView control. You can try www.reachlite.com.
fields.summary: Issue with .NET Browser Config File for WebView Control
fields.environment: IPAD, IPhone, IPAD and IPhone Simulators

comments.body: What exactly are you seeing and what are you expecting? Can you provide some code and screenshots?
